text.section: No examination or part of any examination required by this chapter shall be given unless two (2) or more members of the board are present to supervise the examination;

Examinations given by the board shall cover all phases of the applicant's qualifications for the license applied for including skill and technique of applicant as well as scientific and other knowledge;
Examinations shall be given at regularly prescribed intervals;
Examinations shall be given at the principal office of the board.

law.history: Amended 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 103, sec. 3, effective July 15, 2008. -- Amended 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 111, sec. 135, effective July 13, 1984. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 354, sec. 21. -- Created 1960 Ky. Acts ch. 233, sec. 16, effective June 16, 1960.
